channel.title: CVE Feed for ICS-CERT -- Advantech WebAccess HMI Designer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ICS-CERT -- Advantech WebAccess HMI Designer

item.title: CVE-2018-8833|2024-08-05T07:02:26.164Z -- ics-cert -- advantech%20webaccess%20hmi%20designer
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities in Advantech WebAccess HMI Designer 2.1.7.32 and prior caused by processing specially crafted .pm3 files may allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-8835|2024-08-05T07:02:26.154Z -- ics-cert -- advantech%20webaccess%20hmi%20designer
item.description: Double free vulnerabilities in Advantech WebAccess HMI Designer 2.1.7.32 and prior caused by processing specially crafted .pm3 files may allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-8837|2024-08-05T07:02:26.122Z -- ics-cert -- advantech%20webaccess%20hmi%20designer
item.description: Processing specially crafted .pm3 files in Advantech WebAccess HMI Designer 2.1.7.32 and prior may cause the system to write outside the intended buffer area and may allow remote code execution.
